description: List inventory changes with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can view all inventory changes. Non-admins can view inventory changes for material suppliers they are manager members of or for brokers they are manager members of (via the material supplier).
validation_notes: material-site, material-type, and material-supplier accept comma-separated IDs (e.g., 123,456). forecast-start-at must be an ISO 8601 timestamp (e.g., 2025-01-01T00:00:00Z).

flags.name: material-site
flags.description: Filter by material site ID (comma-separated for multiple).
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of material site IDs, e.g., 123,456.

flags.name: material-type
flags.description: Filter by material type ID (comma-separated for multiple).
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of material type IDs, e.g., 456,789.

flags.name: material-supplier
flags.description: Filter by material supplier ID (comma-separated for multiple).
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of material supplier IDs, e.g., 789,101.
